channel.title: Best/Easiest type of pure these days?
channel.description:
Haven't played in ages so I dont really know what PKs well anymore. Reason I'm asking is a friend just gave me an account with 70 ranged and nothing else, so I'd like to know what levels I should be going for.
Just looking for a easy to make, good pker (either F2P or members) to use for a lil bit.
Any thoughts?

item.title: Best/Easiest type of pure these days?
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

I only have one account left that i putt around on every now and then and I for f2p the best pure is still range with a r2h/rune scim.

Read full topic
item.source: Best/Easiest type of pure these days?

item.title: Best/Easiest type of pure these days?
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

If your going to be a member, get 94magic via mage training area.

Read full topic
item.source: Best/Easiest type of pure these days?

item.title: Best/Easiest type of pure these days?
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

Well, here’s my plan. Autoed about 5k lobbies last night which sold for around 1M. Bought 13k Iron knives and I’m just going to auto-range at the rock crabs and see what level I end up with, then repeat.

Read full topic
item.source: Best/Easiest type of pure these days?

item.title: Best/Easiest type of pure these days?
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

I’ve always thought pures were pretty stupid and never played on one, but it seems like many low levels are range. Basing this off proof I view over at GameBattles since I’m an RS Admin I mostly see range pures.

Read full topic
item.source: Best/Easiest type of pure these days?

item.title: Best/Easiest type of pure these days?
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

[quote=“Ollie, post:11, topic:350951”][quote author=Lothy link=topic=447302.msg3283847#msg3283847 date=1280072119]

What did he bot on? I think he said Druids were best? I guess not for botting though…

Chaos druids, north of ardougne.
[/quote]

Actually I got it at yanille, in the agility dungeon![/quote]
Oh, forgot about those.

@Chris: Look up a guide on Salarin the Twisted to find out where those ones are.

Read full topic

item.source: Best/Easiest type of pure these days?

item.title: Best/Easiest type of pure these days?
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

Getting 90+ stats takes so fucking long though - Especially in any combat skill. For ranged it takes a shit load of cash, which I suppose I can bot as the acc has level 74 fishing. I’d prefer a 90+ stat in strength though.

70 att
90+ str
1 def
70+ ranged
1 pray
70+ mage

???

Read full topic
item.source: Best/Easiest type of pure these days?

item.title: Best/Easiest type of pure these days?
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

Don’t waste your time unless you’re going to man up and get two 90+ stats. Low level pures are rubbish.

Read full topic
item.source: Best/Easiest type of pure these days?

item.title: Best/Easiest type of pure these days?
item.dc:creator: @kaza Kaza
item.description:
@kaza wrote:

I found my pure extremely boring, as the only way to make money was through flipping and pking.

If you’re F2P half the drops aren’t worth shit all, as nobody risks more than their Rune Scim. That’s why I decided to get def + pray, so if i cbf pking, I can actually do other things.

Read full topic
item.source: Best/Easiest type of pure these days?

item.title: Best/Easiest type of pure these days?
item.dc:creator: @bloodrayne bloodrayne
item.description:
@bloodrayne wrote:

Protip: Create a new account, use Jagex’s 7 day member trial, suicide bot soul wars for points, cancel trial before 7 days are up, if not banned within a few weeks, you’ve got a nice start of a pure with at least one stat 80+ easily

Not like I’ve done it or anything O_o only thing is Jagex only allows one trial per credit card.

Read full topic
item.source: Best/Easiest type of pure these days?

item.title: Best/Easiest type of pure these days?
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

If you get like 9 crafting i think it is, you can buy gold bars & nats, craft bars into bracelets & alch for profit. (Although its only 1gp per bracelet, its free mage xp)

Read full topic

item.title: Best/Easiest type of pure these days?

A mage pure is easy to make, you can get easy exp with teleporting and alching.
